deal.product_description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra is a premium 47mm LTE Titanium smartwatch designed for both style and functionality. It features a circular display made with durable materials suitable for outdoor activities, providing GPS tracking, health monitoring, and custom apps for various needs. The robust design integrates a range of smart features including notifications, music control, and heart rate tracking, making it an ideal companion for fitness enthusiasts and tech-savvy users alike.

The Refurbished Unlocked Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max offers an impressive 256GB storage and a huge display, perfect for both media consumption and productivity. Enjoy advanced camera technology for stunning photos. This model is designed to provide a seamless user experience with 5G capabilities for faster downloads and streaming. Refurbished to high standards, it comes in various colors and can support all the latest apps from the App Store, accommodating any Apple enthusiast's needs.

The Refurb Unlocked Samsung Galaxy S22 is a powerful smartphone with a sleek design and robust features. It boasts a Qualcomm Snapdragon processor, an impressive 6.8-inch WQHD+ edge-to-edge display, and a multi-camera setup including a 108MP rear and 40MP front camera for exceptional photography. With 8GB of RAM and 128GB of storage, it supports demanding applications and multitasking, while running on Android 12 for an up-to-date software experience. Rest assured, it also comes with a 1-year warranty for added security.

The Certified Refurb iRobot Roomba j9+ is a self-emptying and auto-fill robot vacuum and mop that features a Clean Base which automatically empties debris and refills water for up to 30 days of cleaning. It offers a fully retractable mop function along with 4-stage cleaning capabilities to ensure thorough sanitation. With a 2-year Allstate warranty included, this model combines convenience and reliability, making it an ideal choice for maintaining a clean home effortlessly.

The Certified Refurb iRobot Roomba j9+ is a top-tier self-emptying and auto-fill robot vacuum designed to simplify cleaning tasks. It features a Clean Base that automatically empties debris and refills water or solution, allowing for up to 30 days of hassle-free cleaning. This model offers a retractable mop and a 4-stage cleaning system to effectively maintain various floor types. With a 2-year Allstate warranty included, it provides reliable performance with ease of use for busy households.

The Unlocked Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G is not only a powerful smartphone but also an incredible value with its large 128GB storage. This device supports 5G connectivity, Bluetooth, GPS, and NFC, making it ideal for tech-savvy users. Featuring a stunning display and advanced camera capabilities, it ensures vibrant visuals and top-notch photography. Complete with a 1-year Allstate warranty, this phone represents one of the best deals in the market for a premium smartphone experience.

The Roborock Q5 DuoRoller+ Self-Empty Robot Vacuum offers advanced cleaning technology with a powerful 5500Pa suction. Designed to operate quietly, it can run for up to 240 minutes on a single charge, making it perfect for larger homes. The vacuum includes a generous 26-oz. dustbin, automatically emptying its contents which simplifies maintenance. Ideal for those who want to keep their home clean without manual effort, this vacuum is a smart addition to any household.

The Certified Refurb Apple MacBook Pro M2 Pro features the powerful Apple M2 Pro Chip that enhances performance for both productivity and entertainment tasks. The 14.2" Liquid Retina XDR display delivers stunning visuals, while the 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD ensure rapid processing speed and ample storage. Running macOS, it provides a seamless experience for users familiar with the Apple ecosystem. This laptop combines power and elegance, making it a top choice for professionals and creators alike.

The Refurbished Unlocked Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra boasts high-end specifications and a premium design. With a large 6.8-inch AMOLED display featuring a 3120x1440 resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate, this smartphone is designed for an immersive viewing experience. It's equipped with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, offering seamless performance for multitasking and gaming. The device features cutting-edge camera technology, including a 200MP lens with 100x zoom capabilities, allowing you to capture stunning photos and videos. This model comes with a 1-year Allstate warranty, ensuring its reliability.

The HP AMD Ryzen 5 laptop features a large 17.3" display, offering impressive visuals for work or multimedia consumption. This laptop comes equipped with a 512GB SSD, ensuring fast data access and ample storage for your files. Its robust AMD Ryzen 5 processor delivers smooth performance for multitasking and everyday usage. The sleek design combined with functionality makes it a powerful choice for both students and professionals looking for reliability and performance.

The Asus Vivobook 14 is a powerful laptop packed with modern features. It is powered by a 13th Generation Intel Core i3-1315U processor, offering impressive performance and efficiency for multitasking or running demanding applications. With a 14" display boasting a 1920x1080 (1080p) resolution, 8GB of RAM, and a 128GB SSD, it provides ample storage and speed for everyday tasks. Pre-installed with Windows 11 Home, this laptop is ready to use right out of the box, making it a great option for students and professionals alike.

The 200W LiFePo4 Portable Power Station is a high-capacity power solution, perfect for camping and emergency use. With a substantial 60,000mAh capacity and 12V output, it provides a reliable source of energy. This model features two USB-C and two USB-A ports, allowing multiple devices to be powered simultaneously. Its compact design makes it portable, while still offering enough power for your essential electronics.

The Saneen 64MP 4K Vlogging Digital Camera is perfect for creators seeking high-quality content capture. It features a powerful 64MP resolution for stunning ultra HD pictures and can record in 4K video, ensuring that every moment is captured with clarity. This camera comes with multiple focus modes, including auto, manual, and fixed focus, alongside an impressive 18x digital zoom for versatile shooting. It also includes a 3" flip-up screen for easy self-shooting, continuous shooting modes, time lapse, and slow motion recording, along with essential accessories like a 32GB memory card, two batteries, and a USB-C charging cable.

The TCL Q6-Series 65Q651G is a feature-rich 65-inch 4K HDR QLED UHD Smart TV renowned for its stunning visual performance. It utilizes HDR10+, HLG, and HDR10 technology to enhance color and contrast for an immersive viewing experience. Integrated with Google TV, it offers seamless access to your favorite streaming services and smart home compatibility, including Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. This model also includes three HDMI ports for easy connectivity, making it a versatile choice for any entertainment setup.

The Dell Alienware Aurora Ultra 7 is a high-performance gaming desktop featuring an Intel Core Ultra 7 265 CPU with capabilities ranging from 1.8GHz to 5.3GHz, combined with a substantial 32GB RAM and a 1TB SSD for storage. It comes equipped with the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 graphics card, ensuring exceptional gaming visuals and speed. Ideal for serious gamers, this setup ensures smooth and uninterrupted gameplay across demanding titles.

The Mucar CDE900 OBD2 Diagnostic Scanner features a 4" touch display and runs on Android 6.0, making it an efficient tool for car diagnostics. This model provides a comprehensive overview of your vehicle's health, allowing you to troubleshoot OBD2 error codes effectively. It simplifies the process of understanding automotive issues, making it ideal for both DIY enthusiasts and professional mechanics. Its portability and user-friendly interface make it a must-have for any car owner looking to maintain their vehicle in top condition.

The Microsoft Office Pro 2024 offers a comprehensive suite of applications including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, designed to enhance productivity for home and professional environments. This 2-PC lifetime license allows users to install the software on two devices without recurring fees, making it a cost-effective solution for long-term use. The included Excel Templates Bundle offers ready-to-use templates for personal and business organization, streamlining various tasks. Instant email delivery ensures that users can quickly download and activate the software upon purchase.

The Unlocked Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 is a state-of-the-art Android smartphone featuring a large 512GB storage capacity. This model combines cutting-edge technology with impressive capabilities that enhance user experience, including seamless multitasking and stunning displays. Its foldable design allows for versatility, making it perfect for users who need a powerful device that can fit in their pocket.

The Certified Refurb Ninja Sizzle 14" Electric Griddle is designed for optimal cooking results with a spacious cooking surface that accommodates multiple food items at once. It features a digitally controlled cooking process, allowing for precise temperature adjustments and even cooking across the entire surface. Constructed for durability and easy cleaning, this griddle is a versatile addition to any kitchen, perfect for everything from breakfast pancakes to grilled sandwiches.
Experience ultimate gaming performance with the Dell Alienware Aurora 16

The Dell 15 13th-Gen. i7 Laptop features a powerful Intel Core i7-1355U processor, boasting 10 cores and speeds up to 5.00 GHz for seamless multitasking. With a stunning 15.6" Full HD display and a refresh rate of 120Hz, this non-touchscreen laptop provides vibrant visuals for all your media. It comes equipped with 16GB of DDR4 RAM and a spacious 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD, ensuring ample storage and lag-free performance while running Windows 11 Home.

The Onn 100012586 55" 4K HDR LED UHD Roku Smart TV offers stunning picture quality with a native resolution of 3840x2160 pixels. This smart TV is compatible with various streaming services including Apple Home and Amazon Alexa, providing versatile entertainment options. It comes equipped with one USB and three HDMI ports for easy connectivity with other devices. Priced at $188, it presents an excellent opportunity for anyone looking to upgrade their home viewing experience without breaking the bank.

Refurbished from Apple, the MacBook Air M1 (2020) is a lightweight laptop featuring Apple's powerful M1 chip, designed for speed and efficiency. With a 13-inch Retina display, it provides stunning visuals and reliable performance for tasks ranging from web browsing to professional applications. This model comes with a 1-year Allstate warranty, ensuring peace of mind with your purchase.

The iRobot Roomba j7+ Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum features smart mapping technology that allows it to learn your home’s layout for efficient cleaning. Equipped with a self-cleaning cartridge filter, it guarantees that pet hair and allergens are captured effectively. The j7+ is designed for effortless operation, navigating around furniture and avoiding obstacles, ensuring a thorough and convenient cleaning experience. With its robust capabilities, this vacuum helps maintain a cleaner home effortlessly.

The Sumry 4,000W Hybrid Solar Inverter is designed for versatility, converting DC 34V to AC 110V for efficient power management. It features a built-in 140A MPPT solar charger that is compatible with various battery types, including 24V lead-acid and lithium batteries. With its robust functionality, this inverter is an excellent choice for those looking to integrate renewable energy solutions into their home or business. The design is compact, enhancing both installation and operational efficiency.

The Certified Refurb Tineco Floor ONE S5 Smart Cordless Wet/Dry Vacuum Cleaner offers an innovative cleaning experience with automatic adjustment of suction power and water flow based on the type of flooring. Featuring a dual-tank system, it keeps clean and dirty water separate for efficient cleaning. This model also includes a self-cleaning function that makes maintenance hassle-free. Ideal for households with pets or messy kids, the Tineco Vacuum combines convenience with powerful cleaning capabilities in one sleek design.

The Eco-Worthy 12V/24V 20A Lithium LifePO4 Smart Battery Charger & Maintainer ensures a safe and efficient charging experience for your batteries. This versatile charger is designed to support lithium batteries, maintaining their safety and longevity. Its smart design allows you to charge and maintain batteries without the risk of overcharging or damaging them. With a reliable performance, this charger is essential for anyone looking to care for their Lithium battery equipment effectively.

The Refurbished Dyson V11 Torque Drive+ is a cordless vacuum that combines powerful suction with smart technology. It features a high-efficiency filter that captures microscopic particles, making it ideal for allergy sufferers. With a runtime of up to 60 minutes, users can clean large areas without needing to recharge. The model includes various attachments, such as a crevice tool and a mini soft dusting brush, catering to different cleaning tasks. Its sleek design and advanced features make it a standout choice for homeowners focused on superior cleaning performance.

The Garvee Car Service Lift Ramp 2-Pack provides an efficient solution for lifting your vehicle, with a robust load capacity of 12,000lbs. These ramps are adjustable in height from 9.8 to 15 inches, accommodating various vehicle types. Constructed from heavy-duty steel, they offer durability and feature a rust-resistant coating for long-lasting use. Their easy installation makes them an ideal choice for both professional mechanics and DIY enthusiasts seeking convenience and reliability.

The Hisense U7 Series 85U7K is an impressive 85-inch 4K UHD Smart TV offering stunning resolution and exceptional performance. With a refresh rate of 144Hz, it provides smooth motion handling ideal for action-packed scenes and gaming. Compatible with Google TV and voice assistants like Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, this smart TV provides added convenience and functionality. The TV features multiple HDMI 2.1 inputs, making it versatile for a wide range of devices.

The SweetNight Gloaming Queen Mattress features a 14-inch hybrid design, combining memory foam and pocketed coils for optimal support and comfort. It includes a soft touch breathable cover, while the cooling gel infusion helps regulate body temperature for a restful sleep. As an added bonus, two queen cooling pillows are included, enhancing your sleep experience. This mattress is designed to support all sleeping positions and is ideal for couples with varying comfort needs.

The Wyze S 20,000Pa Cordless Stick Vacuum offers powerful suction with 100AW capabilities, ideal for cleaning tough messes. Weighing just 2.8 lbs, it's lightweight and easy to maneuver for effortless cleaning throughout your home. The vacuum operates on a 40-minute interchangeable lithium-ion battery, ensuring you can tackle large areas without interruption. An LED screen provides real-time information on battery life and suction power, giving you full control over your cleaning tasks. This vacuum combines convenience with powerful performance, making it a valuable addition to your cleaning arsenal.

The SucceBuy 3,000W Stud Welder Dent Repair Kit is an all-in-one solution for car body repair, making it easy to remove dents and dings without damaging the paint. It features manual mode and auto contact mode for user convenience, and comes with multiple accessories to tackle various repair tasks. The kit is equipped with overheat protection for added safety during operation, ensuring durability and reliability for both amateur and professional use.

Experience high-performance with the Corsair Vengeance RGB 32GB DDR5 Desktop Memory. This memory kit features 288-pin PC5-48000 technology for outstanding speed and responsiveness in your system. With its stunning RGB lighting, it not only improves performance but also adds a visual flair to your setup. This premium memory is currently priced at $160.

The Certified Refurb Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is a powerful cleaning tool featuring three attachments, including a motorized head for deep cleaning carpets and a soft cleaner for hard floors. Its LCD screen display provides real-time updates on battery life and performance, while the run time countdown feature keeps you informed on remaining usage time. This vacuum comes with a 2-year Allstate warranty, ensuring peace of mind with your purchase.

The Microsoft Office Standard 2024 for Mac provides a robust suite of essential applications, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote. This one-device lifetime license ensures you will not need to deal with any recurring subscription fees, as it's a one-time digital download. Additionally, it comes with 10 essential Excel sheets templates to streamline personal and business organization. The instant email delivery makes it a convenient option for those needing quick access to office software.

The Samsung 77" S90D OLED 4K Smart TV features cutting-edge OLED technology that delivers stunning picture quality with deep blacks and vibrant colors. It offers 4K resolution for crystal-clear images and smart capabilities that let you access streaming services effortlessly. This model seamlessly fits into your home entertainment system and comes with intuitive controls for a user-friendly experience, making it perfect for movie nights or gaming sessions.

The Azdome M550 3-Channel Dash Cam offers comprehensive coverage with its triple recording capabilities of 2.5K + 1080p + 2.5K, ideal for capturing all angles on the road. Enhanced features include infrared night vision and built-in WiFi and GPS, making it a reliable companion for your driving needs. This dash cam is particularly beneficial for those concerned with safety and accountability on the road. A 64GB memory card is included for immediate use, ensuring you are ready to start recording straight out of the box.

The SucceBuy 4,500-lb. Electric Winch is designed for heavy-duty applications and provides essential pulling power for various tasks. With a robust construction, it features a powerful motor that can handle up to 4,500 lbs with ease, making it suitable for towing vehicles, boats, and more. This winch is equipped with a wireless remote control for convenience, allowing you to operate it from a distance. Its durable design ensures longevity, making it a reliable tool for any outdoor enthusiast or professional.

The SimpliSafe Whole Home 9-Piece Security System is designed to offer comprehensive home protection with its versatile security features. This system includes multiple sensors for doors and windows, ensuring that every entry point is monitored. The easy setup and operation make it user-friendly, while the included smart technology allows for remote monitoring from your smartphone. With its reliable performance, this system provides peace of mind for homeowners looking to enhance their security.

The SucceBuy 2.5-Ton Pneumatic Low Profile Floor Jack is designed for ease of use with its low-profile build that allows access to vehicles with minimal clearance. This jack features a pneumatic pump for quick lifting and is robust enough to handle heavy loads. Its durable construction ensures longevity, making it a vital tool for any garage or workshop.

The Ring Battery Doorbell Plus is designed to enhance your home's security with exceptional clarity and ease of use. Featuring advanced motion detection, it alerts you to activity at your door through your smartphone instantly. This doorbell includes a built-in camera with high-definition video capabilities, allowing you to see and communicate with visitors in real-time, whether you're home or away. Its sleek design integrates well with your home's exterior while offering convenience with battery-powered functionality. The inclusion of an indoor camera adds an extra layer of monitoring, making it an ideal choice for safety-conscious homeowners.

The Black+Decker 0.7-Cu. Ft. 700W Microwave Oven offers efficient cooking and defrosting features, perfect for quick meal prep. With six one-touch presets and 10 power levels, it provides versatility for all your cooking needs. Its compact size makes it suitable for smaller kitchens or as an additional cooking tool, while the user-friendly interface ensures it's easy to use for everyone.
